traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.description: If the panther moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claws attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition. If the target has the Prone condition, the panther can make one Bite attack against it as a Bonus Action.
